MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA16 postcode area of Greenock. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:31pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a damaged roadside pillar outside 79 Mavis Road and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:28pm on Monday, 11th January 2021.
